title: Democrats Are Terrified and Justice Breyer’s Retirement Is Proof | 1/27/22
description:
Filling in for Glenn, Pat and Stu discuss the upcoming retirement of Supreme Court Justice Stephen Breyer and President Biden’s promise to select a black woman to fill the seat. Pat and Stu discuss the current ideological makeup of the Supreme Court as they go through the possible Breyer replacements. Stu lays out the reasons why Biden will get a Supreme Court Justice pick with little fight. Pat and Stu discuss Spotify removing Neil Young’s music after his failed ultimatum. Pat and Stu discuss the advancement of technology to the credit of capitalism. Pat and Stu discuss the predictions that “The Jetsons” made that turned out to be correct. Pat and Stu discuss the impossibility of COVID being eradicated and how life should get back to normal for Americans.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
